documentation.title: SlideMenuPanel Class [Javascript]
documentation.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation

method.name: getSlideMenu
method.shortdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the Panel belongs to
method.longdesc: Get object of slidemenu which the Panel belongs to
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function testSlideMenu()
    {
        // Get slidemenu object of a panel with id="panel", then collapse all the slidemenu
        var _panel = new SlideMenuPanel("panel");
        _panel.getSlideMenu().collapseAll();
    }
</script>
